title: Overpowered
description: After rescuing Nova from a life of evil, Maci fears she's made a huge mistake. As if she didn't have enough trouble fitting in with her fellow Supers, Nova outshines Maci in personality and power. In the midst of this one-sided sibling rivalry, humans are dropping dead from a powerful drug that originates in the underground tunnels of King City. Someone is a traitor and Maci wants to capture the villain before anyone elseâ€”especially Nova.With Nova in the spotlight, Maci needs to set aside her jealousy before more humans die and the future of King City is changed forever.
author: Cheyanne Young
